document.full_text: general motors co is recalling 154,112 of its top-selling chevrolet cruze compact cars to check that the steering shaft was properly installed, the automaker said on wednesday.
document.title: gm recalls 2011 cruze cars to inspect steering shaft
lines_and_colors: general motors co is recalling 154,112 of its top-selling chevrolet cruze compact cars to check that the steering shaft was properly installed, the automaker said on wednesday.
